snippet: While it appeared Rashad Jennings, the Giants’ leading rusher, would return to action Sunday after missing the last four games, Jacquian Williams, the team’s top tackler, will not play because of a concussion.
abstract: Top Giants running back Rashad Jennings, who missed four games due to knee sprain, will return to action in match against San Francisco 49ers; good news is offset by loss of linebacker Jacquian Williams and others due to injury; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: While it appeared Rashad Jennings, the Giants’ leading rusher, would return to action Sunday after missing the last four games, Jacquian Williams, the team’s top tackler, will not play because of a concussion.

headline.main: Split Fortunes for Giants’ Fragile Ground Game
headline.print_headline: Split Fortunes for Giants’ Fragile Ground Game
